films.name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
films.title: Peter Parker and his classmates go on a summer vacation to Europe. However, the friends are unlikely to be able to rest - upon arrival in Venice, the group will fall into the epicenter of the battle. A certain creature consisting of water appears out of nowhere and starts destroying everything in its path, and now Peter will have to save European architectural monuments along with the mysterious superhero Mysterio.

films.name: Top Gun: Maverick
films.title: Pete Mitchell, nicknamed Maverick, has been one of the Navy's best pilots for more than 30 years: a fearless test pilot who pushes the boundaries of what is possible and studiously avoids a promotion that would land him forever. While training the Top Gun Alumni for a special mission, Maverick meets Lieutenant Bradley Bradshaw, the son of his late friend, Lieutenant Nick Bradshaw. Ahead - uncertainty, behind - the ghosts of the past. Maverick is forced to confront his deep-seated fears, which threaten to come to life as part of a mission that requires exceptional dedication from those who will be assigned to take off.

films.name: Cheburashka
films.title: Sometimes it takes one little big-eared hero to bring back the sun and smiles to the adult world. A furry restless animal from a distant orange country is waiting for amazing adventures in a quiet seaside town, where he will have to find a name, friends and a home.

films.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
films.title: In the third part of the story about a young wizard, the beloved characters - Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione - return to the third year of the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. This time, they must solve the mystery of a prisoner who has escaped from the sinister prison of Azkaban, whose stay in the wild puts Harry in mortal danger...

films.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
films.title: Harry Potter is in his second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Dobby the elf warns Harry of the danger that awaits him there and asks him not to return to school again.The young wizard does not follow the elf's advice and becomes a witness to the mysterious events unfolding at Hogwarts. Harry and his friends soon learn of the existence of the Chamber of Secrets and face new adventures as they try to defeat the dark forces.

films.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
films.title: The life of a ten-year-old Harry Potter cannot be called sweet: his parents died as soon as he was a year old, and only pokes and slaps come from his uncle and aunt, who took the orphan to raise. But on Harry's eleventh birthday, everything changes. A strange guest who suddenly appeared on the doorstep brings a letter from which the boy learns that he is in fact a wizard and enrolled in a school of magic called Hogwarts. And in a couple of weeks, Harry will rush on the Hogwarts Express train towards a new life, where incredible adventures, true friends and, most importantly, the key to unraveling the mystery of his parents' death await him.

films.name: Uncharted
films.title: Pete Mitchell, nicknamed Maverick, has been one of the Navy's best pilots for more than 30 years: a fearless test pilot who pushes the boundaries of what is possible and studiously avoids a promotion that would land him forever. While training the Top Gun Alumni for a special mission, Maverick meets Lieutenant Bradley Bradshaw, the son of his late friend, Lieutenant Nick Bradshaw. Ahead - uncertainty, behind - the ghosts of the past. Maverick is forced to confront his deep-seated fears, which threaten to come to life as part of a mission that requires exceptional dedication from those who will be assigned to take off.

films.name: The Batman
films.title: After two years of searching for justice on the streets of Gotham, Batman becomes for the townspeople the personification of merciless retribution. When a series of violent attacks on high-ranking officials take place in the city, clues lead Bruce Wayne to the darkest corners of the underworld, where he meets Catwoman, the Penguin, Carmine Falcone, and the Riddler. Now under the gun is Batman himself, who will have to distinguish friend from foe and restore justice in the name of Gotham.

films.name: The Northman
films.title: Late IX century, a small island in the North Atlantic. King Orvandill, seriously wounded, returns from a campaign to his wife Gudrun and young son Amlet. Dreaming of a journey to another reflection and death on the battlefield, he passes his son to the throne, but immediately dies at the hands of his brother Fjolnir - he cuts off the monarch's head and takes the kingdom and Gudrun for himself. The boy manages to escape. After a while, Amlet grows into a strong ruthless Viking and repeats in another devastated village, meets a witch who puts him on the spot. Upon learning that Fjolnir and Gudrun have settled in Iceland, Amlet goes there with a batch of Slavic slaves. On the shore, his attention was attracted by Olga from the Birch Forest..

films.name: Prey
films.title: North of the Great Plains, 1719. The girl Naru from the Comanche tribe wants more than anything to become a worthy hunter, but her relatives do not take her passion seriously. When a group of experienced hunters goes into the forest in search of a tribesman attacked by a cougar, Naru, as an experienced tracker, goes with them and soon notices strange footprints. Rescuing a comrade is successful, but the fight with a wild cat for Naru is not very good. Not wanting to put up with the fact that her brother was recognized as the best hunter, the girl decides to hunt down and kill that strange predator at all costs, and she does not even realize that her prey

films.name: The Adam Project
films.title: Time-traveling pilot Adam Reed crash-lands in 2022 and sets out with himself as a 12-year-old to save the future.

films.name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
films.title: Doctor Strange, with the help of Wong, saves a teenage girl named America Chavez from a giant octopus, who, when frightened, can open portals to parallel universes. Trying to save a new acquaintance from an evil force that wants to get her ability, the Doctor, along with America, embarks on a journey through the multiverse.

films.name: The Gray Man
films.title: In 2003, the CIA recruits Kurt Gentry, who is serving time for the murder, and he becomes the so-called gray man - a special agent codenamed Sierra Six. 18 years later, having eliminated another target, he learns that he just killed the former Sierra Four, and receives a carrier with information that poses a threat to the secret Sierra program. Refusing to hand over the map to his superiors, Six himself becomes a target not only for former colleagues, but also for elite mercenaries, the most dangerous of which is the scumbag Lloyd Hansen.

films.name: Bullet Train
films.title: A mercenary codenamed Ladybug is sent on a new mission: instead of a sick colleague, he must take the Tokyo-Kyoto high-speed train, steal a suitcase and get off at an intermediate station. But the execution of a simple task is greatly complicated when it turns out that the composition is simply teeming with all sorts of killers.

films.name: Avatar: The Way of Water
films.title: After taking on the avatar form of a soldier, Jake Sully becomes the leader of the Na'vi people and takes on the mission of protecting new friends from mercenary businessmen from Earth. Now he has someone to fight for - with Jake, his beautiful beloved Neytiri. When heavily armed earthlings return to Pandora, Jake is ready to fight back.

films.name: Babylon
films.title: Hollywood, 1926 At a noisy party in the producer's mansion, aspiring actress Nellie Laroy and a guy from the serving staff, Manny Torres, meet. The event is not only fun, but also beneficial for both: Nellie receives an invitation to shoot, and Manny drives drunk silent film star Jack Conrad home, and he asks the guy to work as his assistant. So both get on the set and begin to make a career in the movie: Nelly - in the acting field, Manny - as an assistant producer. Meanwhile, progress does not stand still, and sound films are gaining popularity.

comments.name: “People cannot live without faith. And the current ones are ready to believe in anything.”
comments.body: 2017 has been an experimental year for Marvel's most commercially successful comic book adaptation studio. Firstly, the long-awaited project about one of the most popular superheroes of the Marvel Universe, Spider-Man, was launched. Secondly, director Taika Waititi breathed new life into the Thor series, which turned out to be not the most attractive from the point of view of audience interest, after which not only the series itself received permission to shoot a new fourth part, which was not part of the Marvel rules, because the studio adhered to range of three films
